scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build" "cd remotes/remote1; npm run build" "cd remotes/remote2; npm run build" "cd remotes/remote3; npm run build" "cd remotes/remote4; npm run build"

scripts.serve:all: concurrently "npm start" "cd remotes/remote1; npm run serve" "cd remotes/remote2; npm run serve" "cd remotes/remote3; npm run serve" "cd remotes/remote4; npm run serve"

scripts.clean:remotes: concurrently "cd remotes/remote1; npm run clean" "cd remotes/remote2; npm run clean" "cd remotes/remote3; npm run clean" "cd remotes/remote4; npm run clean"
